thread.title: The Charlotte Knights are celebrating 'Read Across America Day' | wcnc.com
thread.title_full: The Charlotte Knights are celebrating 'Read Across America Day' | wcnc.com

author: Charlotte Today
title: The Charlotte Knights are celebrating 'Read Across America Day' | wcnc.com
text:
CHARLOTTE, N.C. — The Knights and Homer the Dragon are celebrating “Read Across America Day” and will be reading to local Charlotte area kids at three schools this Friday morning. The schools on Friday are: Unity Classical Charter, Lake Wylie Elementary & Sterling Elementary.
The Charlotte Knights are also gearing up for opening Day of the 2024 season which is set for Tuesday, April 2. This year marks the 10th season in Truist Field history and the Knights have welcomed over 5 million fans through the gates since opening in 2014.
Truist Field is nominated as one of the best ballparks in Minor League Baseball and there is currently a vote going on at USA TODAY. Click here to vote!
Their 2024 promo calendar has been released, and features 24 fireworks shows, five celebrity guests, bobblehead giveaways and more this year! Find more information here .
Charlotte Today is a local lifestyle and entertainment show where you'll learn everything about the Queen City with hosts Mia Atkins and Eugene Robinson on WCNC Charlotte live weekdays at 11 a.m.
From what’s trending to local restaurants, events and entertainment, you’ll find it all on this show.
